altername_name: Nickelodeon Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Crystal Kingdom
name: Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Crystal Kingdom
overview: A Greedy King has taken all of the crystals that make Crystal Kingdom colorful and without them the Crystal Kingdom is starting to lose its color! Join Dora, Boots and Allie on an adventure through storybook lands to recover crystals and save the Crystal Kingdom!
